Headers
#include <iv/base.h>
#include <extit/base.h>
#include <extit/pmodule_impl.h>

Usage
typedef struct
{
         extit_status_t          (*op_probe)(extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t * descr, const extit_container_t * container);  
         extit_status_t          (*op_create)(extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t * descr, const extit_container_t * container, void ** ctx_ptr);  
         extit_status_t          (*op_destroy)(extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t * descr, const extit_container_t * container, void * ctx);  
         void *          (*op_get_interface)(extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t * descr, const extit_container_t * container, void * ctx, const char * iid, iv_version_t version);  
         iv_version_t          (*op_query_interface)(extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t * descr, const extit_container_t * container, void * ctx, const char * iid, iv_version_t base_version);  
         extit_status_t          (*op_unload)(extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t * descr, const extit_container_t * container);  
} extit_pmodule_ops_comp_1_0_t

The version 1.0 plugin module interface operations component.

Members:
op_probe - Probe the module. Implementers should do minimal checking, such as required interfaces, without any potentially long running operations.
op_create - Create a module instance. Any private data references should be assigned to ctx_ptr.
op_destroy - Destroy a module instance. Any private data reference by ctx should be released.
op_get_interface - Get a named interface object by version for an instance.
op_query_interface - Query the supported version of an interface for an instance.
op_unload - Release any global resources still allocated by this module. This is called just prior to unloading the module from the process.
Version:
ABI 1.0
Since:
ABI 1.0
typedef struct
{
         extit_pmodule_ops_comp_1_0_t          v0;  
} extit_pmodule_ops_1_0_t

The version 1.0 plugin module interface operations.

Members:
v0 - The x.0 component.
Version:
ABI 1.0
Since:
ABI 1.0
typedef struct
{
         uint32_t          magic;  
         iv_version_t          extit_version;  
} extit_pmodule_descriptor_base_t
Members:
magic - The value defined by EXTIT_PMODULE_MAGIC.
extit_version - The ExtIt interface version used by this module.
Since:
1.0
typedef struct
{
         uint32_t          magic;  
         iv_version_t          extit_version;  
         const char *          id;  
         uint32_t          id_version;  
         const char *          name;  
         const char *          version;  
         extit_pmodule_ops_1_0_t *          ops;  
} extit_pmodule_descriptor_1_0_t
Members:
magic - The value defined by EXTIT_PMODULE_MAGIC.
extit_version - The ExtIt interface version used by this module.
id - The unique module identifier.
id_version - The module version value. Its value must be lexicographic, but is otherwise treated as opaque.
name - The human readable module name.
version - The human readable module version.
ops - The module operations.
Version:
ABI 1.0
Since:
ABI 1.0
EXTIT_DECLARE_PMODULE(id, id_version, name, version, ops)

Declare a module with fields that populate its extit_pmodule_descriptor_t.

Parameters:
id - The unique module identifier.
id_version - The module version value. Its value must be lexicographic, but is otherwise treated as opaque.
name - The human readable module name.
version - The human readable module version.
ops - The module operations.
Version:
1.0
Since:
1.0
typedef ... extit_pmodule_descriptor_t

A generic plugin module descriptor that is mapped to the appropriate descriptor version based on EXTIT_ABI_TARGET.

Since:
1.0
EXTIT_PMODULE_MAGIC

The magic value at the beginning of the module descriptor.

Since:
ABI 1.0
EXTIT_PMODULE_DESCRIPTOR_NAME

The global module descriptor name.

Since:
1.0
EXTIT_PMODULE_DESCRIPTOR_SYMBOL

The global module descriptor symbol string.

Since:
1.0
